Race.SpecificTitle: Constable -- Justice of the Peace District 2
Constable -- Justice of the Peace District 4
PW School District -- Local Option - Term Limits
Race.FullText:
"LOCAL OPTION ELECTION
Within LaSalle Parish School District:
Shall the number of terms of office that any member of the school board may serve be limited to three consecutive four-year terms?"

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Police Jury -- 1.21 mills - PJ - 10 yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 years, 1.21 mills property tax renewal for maintaining, operating, constructing and support of all public health services under the supervision of the LaSalle Parish Health Unit.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a one and twenty-one hundredths (1.21) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the Parish (an estimated $84,700 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2014 and ending with the year 2023, for the purpose of maintaining, operating, constructing and support all of public health services under the supervision of the LaSalle Parish Health Unit?
